snippet.title: Hunt: Showdown 1896 I Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Welcome to the new era of Hunt: Showdown 1896, out now on PC, PS5 & Xbox Series X|S! 

With the Corruption spreading across the lands, twisting people into malformed monstrosities, Hunters from all walks of life answer the call for blood, revenge, and good old-fashioned greed. Armed to the teeth with lead and steel, it isn't just the dead who find themselves looking down the barrel of a gun.

Play now on Steam with our Free Weekend until 19th August!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Get Hunt Showdown on Steam: https://tinyurl.com/Hunt1896SteamYoutube

Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/huntshowdown
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/huntshowdown
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/crytek
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@huntshowdownofficial
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/huntshowdown

#HuntShowdown #Hunt
